product_name: Oh K!Ginseng and Eucalyptus Under Eye Masks
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackPerk up & revitalize the delicate eye area with these Oh K! Awakening Ginseng and Eucalyptus Under Eye Masks.
details: DetailsBenefitsSoothesHydratesKey IngredientsGinseng Root Extract - boosts hydration and improves skin tone & texture.Eucalyptus Leaf Extract - skin soothing.Formulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesItem 2583228How To UsePlace masks under the eye area after cleansing. Remove after 10 minutes and gently pat any excess serum in to the skin. Store in the fridge beforehand for an extra refreshing and cooling boost.In the rare event of an adverse reaction discontinue use. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes and lips. Do not use on sensitive or broken skin.IngredientsAqua (Water, Eau), Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Chondrus Crispus (Carrageenan) Powder, Glyceryl Stearate, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Polyacrylate, Panax Ginseng Root, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Dextrin, Trideceth-6, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Extract, Melissa Officinalis Leaf extract, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Flower/ Leaf Extract, Pelargonium Graveolens Extract, Origanum Vulgare Leaf Extract, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Extract, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract , Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol.
how_to_use: Place masks under the eye area after cleansing. Remove after 10 minutes and gently pat any excess serum in to the skin. Store in the fridge beforehand for an extra refreshing and cooling boost.In the rare event of an adverse reaction discontinue use. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes and lips. Do not use on sensitive or broken skin.

reviews.headline: Best eye mask ever!!!!
reviews.comments: I've used eye masks over the years and this is the only one ive used where ive seen a visible improvement. I looked refreshed, lines were minimized and eyes felt hydrated. Idk why this is only sold in individual packs. I need a lifetime supply!!

reviews.headline: Love these!
reviews.comments: I woke up with very swollen itchy eyes from allergies. I washed my face and decided to use these eye gels to see if they would help. I keep them in a mini fridge which made them feel absolutely amazing when i put them on. These are very comfortable to wear and don't slide around. I almost forgot I was wearing them. Besides being cold from the fridge, there was a colling sensation from I'm guessing the eucalyptus in these. It immediately calmed down the itchiness and swelling under my eyes. I am going to stock up on these for sure!

reviews.headline: Scent is nice
reviews.comments: Good for thd eyes! Love it!

reviews.headline: Best
reviews.comments: Champ eye mask ever. It is so important to take csre of the eyes! For not looking tired

reviews.headline: Results were amazing
reviews.comments: put these on before work in the morning with my cup of coffee and felt amazing. Very awakening and the eye masks had a lot of product on them. Felt great using and the results were even better.

reviews.headline: SO refreshing
reviews.comments: A lot of different brands I use for under eye masks don't have enough product on the mask and they tend to dry up very quickly. I was pleased when I opened the package to such soft and hydrated masks! I absolutely loved these, it was so relaxing while using and really helped me wake up!

reviews.headline: Awake and refreshed!
reviews.comments: Left me with such a smooth look under my eyes and less puffiness. Love these under eye masks.

reviews.headline: Yes!!üòç
reviews.comments: I use eye masks all the time and this one is my fav! I ordered them bc I love ohk products so I wasn't too surprised to be absolutely obsessed with these! My bags disappear almost immediately after using in the morning. Totally recommend!

reviews.headline: Very trusted under eye mask
reviews.comments: I have ordered this mask multiple times and it is my favorite eye mask I have ever tried. It is beautiful and leaves my under eyes feeling very refreshed. Love this mask and definitely recommend ordering it.

reviews.headline: I would 100% buy this product again!!
reviews.comments: The underneath of my eyes feel so hydrated and smooth after using this eye mask!

reviews.headline: Love these eye masks
reviews.comments: Any eye masks from this brand are great.. would recommend these and others!

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Use this product almost every morning! It leaves my under eyes very refreshed and hydrated. Perfect start to my day!

reviews.headline: Would use again
reviews.comments: Definitely Awakening, I almost felt a little tingling sensation . My under eyes looked brighter and more hydrated.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Really good product. Used in the morning & felt like it really brightened my under eyes

reviews.headline: Love this under eye mask
reviews.comments: I loved this mask, definitely noticed a difference under my eyes. Will definitely buy this again

reviews.headline: Very refreshing

reviews.headline: Really revitalising and good quality
